name: BitePal
overview:
BitePal is a platform that enables restaurants to create and manage time-sensitive discounts, and lets consumers get those discounts for free and much more quickly than through any other product.

Restaurants employ BitePal to increase capacity utilization, drive incremental revenue, and acquire new customers, while consumers use it to get free real-time deals to local dining spots.

We believe that restaurant deals are much harder to find and use than they should be - primarily due to significant fragmentation across deal operators, prepayment and reservation requirements, confusing deal formats, and suboptimal GUIs.

Our mission is to radically simplify this process on the consumer side, while at the same time providing immediate and measurable value for our merchant partners.
